name: Decisive Battles of World War II: Korsun Pocket
name_original: Decisive Battles of World War II: Korsun Pocket
description:
Decisive Battles of World War II: Korsun Pocket is a strategy game developed by Strategic Studies Group. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Matrix Games.
You can play Decisive Battles of World War II: Korsun Pocket on PC.
